column5: You gain one star for every 6 rays you have at the end of your turn
You can reroll a die of your choise after the last Roll of each other Monster. If you reroll a live; discard this card.
Buying power cards cost 1 ray less
You get 1 extra die
Gain 4 stars and lose 3 lives
Your neighbors los 1 live when you roll at least one claw
If you reach 0 lives discard all your cards and lose your stars. Gain 10 lives and continue playing outside of tokyo.
Gain one star at the end of your turn if don't make anyone lose lives.
At the end of your turn if you have the fewest number of stars; gain one star
When you roll [1 1 1] or more gain 2 extra stars
When you buy Battery monster; put 6 rays on it from the bank. At the start of your turn take 2 rays off and add them to your pool. When there are no rays left discard this card.
Do not lose lives when you lose exactly 1 live
Gain 4 stars
Gain one star
Add one claw to your roll
You can always reroll any 3 you have
Whenever a power card is revelead you have the option to buy it inmmediatly
When you gain any ray gain 1 extra ray
Gain 1 star when you roll at least one claw
When you roll at least [1 2 3]gain 2 stars. You can also use these dice in other combination.
Your claws smash all other monsters
Gain 3 stars
Take anothe turn after this one
Gain 1 star whenever you buy a power card
